description:
Kids crank, so we built one of our famous hydration packs in a size just for them. It comes with a plug-and-play reservoir so the tube can be left in the pack during refills.

  • Made of bombproof bluesign® polyester fabric with DWR and a PU coating for great water resistance
  • Shoulder straps are shorter and closer together to fit kids’ backs
  • Perforated Ridged foam back panel with mesh overlay keeps it breathable
  • Includes a 1.5L MEC reservoir with plug-and-play hose detachment button
  • Hydration sleeve with hook-and-loop hanger, hose port, and loops on shoulder straps for hose routing
  • 1 large compartment and a small, zippered accessory pocket
  • Front stretch mesh exterior pocket is great for stowing a jacket or extra gear
name: MEC Mountain Fountain JR Hydration Pack - Unisex
